keyMoments.title: Law Represents Heart Pirates in Battle
keyMoments.description: Law, as captain of the Heart Pirates and a Shichibukai, battles Vice Admiral Smoker.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the Heart Pirates' captain's power and influence in the New World.

keyMoments.title: G-5 Marines Witness Law vs. Smoker Battle
keyMoments.description: G-5 Marines watch from outside Law's Room as their Vice Admiral battles the Shichibukai.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the G-5 Marines' helplessness as they witness their commander's defeat.

keyMoments.title: G-5 Commander Smoker Defeated
keyMoments.description: The G-5 Marines witness Smoker's defeat at Law's hands.
keyMoments.significance: A devastating blow to G-5's morale and mission on Punk Hazard.

keyMoments.title: Straw Hats Travel on Brownbeard
keyMoments.description: Luffy, Zoro, Robin, and Usopp ride the defeated Brownbeard toward the research facility.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew's resourcefulness and determination to explore Punk Hazard.

keyMoments.title: Body-Swapped Crew Members Escape
keyMoments.description: Nami, Sanji, Franky, and Chopper deal with their body-swap predicament while rescuing children.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's commitment to helping others despite their own difficulties.

keyMoments.title: Luffy Reunites with Law
keyMoments.description: Luffy arrives at the facility and sees Law for the first time in two years.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the future alliance between the Straw Hat Pirates and Heart Pirates.
